directions.step:
Place bacon on bacon rack. Cover with paper towel. Microwave on High for 3 1/2 minutes or until almost done. Starting 1/2-inch from the end, slit each hot dog lengthwise. Cut cheese into 4 strips and place in hot dog buns. Wrap bacon around hot dogs and secure with toothpicks. Drain grease from bacon rack. Place hot dogs on rack. Cover with paper towel.
Microwave on Medium-High (70%) for 1 1/2 to 2 1/2 minutes. Spread mustard on buns and place bacon wrapped hot dogs in each. Warm, if desired, 8 seconds each. Posted to recipelu-digest Volume 01 Number 403 by "Diane. Geary" <diane@keyway.net> on Dec 26, 1997
